content.question: In in the work shown, Cranach used which of the following means of demonstrating that Luther’s radical ideas were still part of the Christian tradition?

choices.label: He included nude saints modeled after specific classical examples.
He included several biblical scenes in a single image.
He depicted several characters from classical mythology.
He referenced the role of financial donations to the Church.

content.answer: He included several biblical scenes in a single image.
